price: Lalle ne, waɗanda suka kãfirta kuma suka kange (wasu mutãne) daga hanyar Allah, haƙĩƙa, sun ɓace, ɓata mai nĩsa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi qad ḍallū ḍalālan baʿīdan
